newReleases.synopsis:
In an alternate world, the year is 1947, and as India steps into the dawn of its hard-won independence, an extraordinary twist of fate unfolds. A soul from the future, unexpectedly transported back in time, finds himself thrust into the highest office of the land, Prime Minister of a nation on the cusp of rebirth.

What follows is a journey through the corridors of power, where betrayal lurks at every corner, and internal strife threatens to tear the fledgling nation apart. Faced with impossible choices, this modern mind must navigate a country marked by political intrigue, international pressures, and the weight of a people’s hopes.

But beneath the surface lies a larger ambition, the vision of an Akhand Bharat, a united and unshakable India that rises from the ashes of its tragic past to forge a bold new future.

As history begins to unravel and destiny is rewritten, the stakes grow ever higher. What will it take to unify a divided land and bring forth a nation powerful enough to redefine its place on the global stage? In a tale of courage, sacrifice, and the power of leadership, witness the birth of "A New India" unlike any before, a force to be reckoned with, ready to stand among the world’s greats.
newReleases.title: A New India
newReleases.author: Unknown

newReleases.synopsis:
WARNING!
-DARK ROMANCE-


A shifter will only have mate from their kind, but what happens if you are the last creature of your kind?

Lycan.

He is the last of his kind and is the most terrifying type of shifter. But, as scary as he was, he was alone.

However, in order to survive, you don’t have to be the strongest, just deadliest.

***

He looked at her like he had never seen anyone before. The sight of her calmed the rush in his ears, the beat of his heart and finally he was able to focus again…

“She is no longer your responsibility. She is mine to deal with now,” the lycan said.
newReleases.title: A Mate For The Last Lycan
newReleases.author: Unknown

newReleases.synopsis:
Calista's tormented past and Nyx's vengeance.

Escaping from their dark past, Nyx and her brother, Nox, became Rogues in search of answers and freedom. Violence and years of trauma hardened them, while secrets and promises bonded them. What will happen when they cross paths with the pack known for destroying Rogues and conquering the weak? Will the mate bond twist their plans or lead them further down the path of darkness? Is there any salvation for the damned? Only the Moon Goddess knows...

-

"What is your name? Why is your wolf black?"

"It's...not...important."

Three more. My head began to lull forward as my neck could no longer hold the weight. He walked around with thundering footsteps and grabbed my head by my wet curls. He pulled my head back until he could see my face, taunting me with a dark smile and eyes full of delight.

"Why don't you carry a scent? Who are you?"

I gave him a bloody smile as my eyes started to close, darkness singing its siren song beneath the ringing in my ears.

"I thought...you'd...never ask," I panted out weakly as I let Enyo penetrate the room with our scent.

"I'm...your...mate," I added before passing out, welcoming the darkness like an old, missed friend.

-
Most impressive ranking:
#1 in werewolf, #4 in Lycan, #1 in Slow, #4 in Gory

Notes from the Author:

If you are looking for a story that leans more on slow-burning, plot-building themes with multiple moving forces that are not solely centered around the straightforward mate bond romance, then start reading! **Strong language and vivid imagery are scattered throughout**
newReleases.title: A Luna's Flame
newReleases.author: jaiidee

newReleases.synopsis:
[NOT HAREM]

Luxury… How would you describe it? Eating 5 star multi course meals? Extravagant jewels and the finest of clothes? Being chauffeured in most expensive cars and private jets?

All of this was the only thing Varya Vance, heiress to a multi-billion dollar company, knew until Earth was attacked by an Alien Invasion.

After being targeted by the alien emperor, her plan to escape being captured is foiled when she is knocked unconscious.

She wakes up in the bed of an alien prince as the world she once knew ceases to exist.

Join her journey as she seeks to return to the security she once knew. For the first time in her life, she's going to have to rely only on herself.

Only the tough will survive in this new reality of hers where murderous aliens run free and sanctimony has lost all reason.

She had searched for her soulmate on Earth, but it turned out he was in the stars.
newReleases.title: A Lady Does It Better
newReleases.author: Unknown

newReleases.synopsis:
Just a regular job....

Get in, crack the safe, fetch the diamonds. That's what hobby cat burglar and acclaimed jewelry maker Calendar Moonstone has aimed for. Instead she finds a dead body, meets a handsome Detective, has a nosey insurance investigator on her tracks and manages a complicated boyfriend situation. And must solve a century old jewelry mystery!
newReleases.title: A Brilliant Plan
newReleases.author: alexames

trending.title: StepSisters
trending.synopsis:
Jessie and Harper: a lot closer than step sisters should be 

After Harper's mother cheats on her father leading to their divorce she meets a girl on the beach. Little did she know this stranger wouldn't be just a stranger after all.
trending.author: longliverowbrina

trending.synopsis:
Zi Haoran, a man of formidable ambition and pride, finds himself at the crossroads of destiny. Once a towering figure of power and prestige, he now faces the crumbling remnants of his empire, his love, and his identity. The love of his life, Han Xue whose heart was once tender, is now shielded by indifference, hardened by the wounds of their fractured marriage and his mistakes. Yet, just as the darkness threatens to consume him, destiny offers him an unexpected opportunity—not as mercy, but as a challenge.  

This time, Zi Haoran is not only fighting for his wife’s love. He’s reclaiming his throne, his honor, and vengeance against those who conspired against him. As newfound strength surges within him, powers he never imagined begin to awaken, reshaping him into a man even he cannot recognize.

As Zi Haoran embraces this path, his every step seems guided by an uncanny certainty, his power growing sharper and his charisma more irresistible. With each encounter, Han Xue finds it harder to ignore the man who now stands before her—charming, persistent, and surprisingly vulnerable.  


---------------------


Zi Haoran stepped into the living room just as Han Xue tried to leave. His hand shot out, catching her wrist gently but firmly. She turned to glare at him.

“Why now, Zi Haoran?” she demanded, her voice sharp. “Why try to fix what you shattered?”

He pulled her closer, his gaze steady. “Because,” he said softly, “some things are worth breaking myself to rebuild.”

Before she could respond, he tugged her down onto his lap, his arms circling her securely. She gasped, her eyes widening as she struggled against him. “Let me go!”

“Not until you hear me out,” he said firmly, his teasing grin softening his words.

“Why do you keep trying?” she asked, her voice exasperated as she pushed at his chest.

“Because you’re worth it,” he replied, his confidence maddening. “And, let’s face it, you’ve missed me.”

Her cheeks flushed as she shoved harder. “You’re delusional.”

“Maybe,” he murmured, leaning closer, his breath brushing her cheek, “but you didn’t say I was wrong.”

Flustered, she finally broke free, stepping back as she glared at him. “You’re wasting your time. I don’t feel the same anymore,” she snapped.

Without warning, he leaned in and pressed a soft kiss to her cheek, his voice low and playful as he stepped back. “You’ll feel again. You’ll see… I’ve only just begun.”

Her hand flew to her cheek, her eyes blazing with confusion and anger. She turned abruptly and fled the room, leaving Zi Haoran standing there, his smirk fading as he watched her retreat, bewildered by the turmoil he’d stirred.


----------------------


What confounds her most is not just his persistence, but the fire in his eyes—something deeper, as if he knows more than he should, perhaps even the secrets hidden in time itself.

As Han Xue struggles to reconcile this transformed man with the one she once knew, the world shifts around them. His newfound powers, coupled with his sharp mind and commanding presence, turn him into a man of unparalleled strength. Every step he takes to win her heart back is also a step toward reclaiming the world he let slip through his fingers.  

With destiny pulling the strings, will Han Xue’s resistance hold, or will her resolve melt before the man she once loved—and the one he is becoming? One thing is certain: destiny desires nothing less than complete metamorphosis, for love, power, and vengeance.
trending.title: When Destiny Desires
trending.author: Kaeysess

trending.title: PAMPERED BY MY THREE BROTHERS: THE RETURN OF THE NEGLECTED HEIRESS
trending.synopsis:
Penny has three brothers: one is a billionaire CEO, the second is the youngest military lieutenant, and the last is a successful actor. 

These three successful men had only one common ground: bullying Penny, their sore-eye of a little sister. The sister they never wished to have, and the one who claimed to be their real sister, while the sister they treasured all this time was a fake. 

After living a life of maltreatment in her aunt's home, some people of high standing came to Penny with news of her real parentage. She thought she was finally saved from her aunt’s clutches, unaware that what awaited her was worse. 

At 13, Penny only wished for one thing: for her brothers to love her and treat her like family, just as much as they loved their fake sister. She worked and studied ten times harder than anybody else just to be accepted by them. In her desperation, she foolishly fell into a trap set by a malicious person, not knowing her actions would result in the downfall of her brothers and her ending up in jail with a death sentence. 

On her execution day, Penny had only one thought in mind: 

If she ever got to go back in time, her brothers could pamper their fake sister for all she cared! She wanted nothing to do with them! And much to her surprise, Penny found herself back on the day it all began: the day she was born. 

As promised, this time, she wouldn’t foolishly try to earn her brothers' love and affection. Never mind family! She’d just make a lot of money, live in luxury, and make a family of her own! 

But wait, why is it now that she didn’t want anything to do with her brothers, they kept poking their noses into her business? Weren’t they supposed to pamper their fake sister? Why won’t they leave her alone?! 

And how on earth was she married in this lifetime? To make matters worse, this husband she never had in her first life was suddenly volunteering to be the father of her children?!
trending.author: Unknown

trending.title: Married First, Loved Later : A Flash Marriage with My Ex’s "Uncle"
trending.synopsis:
At her wedding banquet, a man claiming to be Selina's lover stormed in, brandishing so-called intimate photos and causing chaos. 

Selina immediately saw through this as a scheme orchestrated by her half-sister, Natalia. However, Selina's fiancé, Ryan, not only refused to believe her but also went out of his way to defend Natalia. 

It turned out that Ryan and Natalia had already developed feelings for each other in secret. Everyone—Selina's father, stepmother, and Ryan's parents—knew about their affair, except for Selina, who was left in the dark. 

Taking advantage of the situation, Selina's father suggested swapping brides, proposing that Natalia replace Selina and complete the wedding. Ryan's family not only didn’t object but wholeheartedly supported the idea. 

That was the moment Selina finally realized the cruel truth: her family and Ryan's family were nothing but wolves in sheep’s clothing! 

"Cancel the engagement? Fine. But let it be clear—I’m the one rejecting you, you two-timing, spineless excuse for a man!" Selina declared with unshakable confidence. 

Her gaze then swept across the room, landing on an elegant and distinguished man. She vaguely remembered him as Ryan’s younger uncle. Walking over, she boldly asked, "Sir, how about getting married?" 

The man raised an eyebrow, finding her audacity intriguing. "It would be my honor, madam," he replied. 

...
trending.author: Unknown

popular.title: Natural Disasters Strikes: I stockpiled like crazy!
popular.synopsis:
(A/N: If a ruthless MC is not your cup of tea, don't read this.)
Heat Wave, Torrential Rain, Severe Cold, Tsunami, Flood, and Alien Beasts swept the world in a series of natural disasters, almost wiping out mankind.

Lu Nanzhi regressed two years to the past and found out that the settings of the natural disasters was similar to the mobile game app she played before regression.

And it was in the beta testing phase.

Ding—

[Beta Game Test is over.]

[Data is being reset.]

[Player is starting over.]

[Please claim the Beta Test Rewards.]

Equip with the Beta Test Rewards, Lu Nanzhi was determine to survive in this life and started stockpiling like crazy!
popular.author: Unknown

popular.title: Never Getting Enough of Her
popular.synopsis:
After being cheated by her scumbag husband, Kimberley experienced a horrible night with a stranger.
Then she was forced to get married under her sister's name to save her family. 
Her second husband was rich and powerful Maddox Yardley, who was trapped in the wheelchair by his broken legs.
They made a deal to be a fake couple, but they were attracted to each other gradually. 
Until Kimberly's pregnancy changed everything. 
She got the baby on that night which was stamped indelibly on her memory. It was that stranger's baby...None knew who he was. And an abortion might kill Kimberley.
What would Kimberly do? Would she risk her life for the child of a stranger? Or leave the husband she loved?
popular.author: Unknown

popular.title: Never Judge
popular.synopsis:
Cedric Reyes has a secret, he is the heir and eldest son of the rich and powerful Reyes clan. As tradition all heirs of their family have to go through a form of poverty training at the age of fifteen. They are left to fend for themselves with no contact and barely any money.

Since leaving, he's gotten married to Adrianna Herandez, the Treasure of the Hernandez clan. Adrianna's family had always looked down at him due to his humble origins, but Adrianna has always stuck by him. Treated badly by his classmates in the past, and his in law in the present. They are about to encounter the shock of their lives.

The Reyes Heir rules the country with his friends, the four princes, who are each from powerful and well respected families.

Join my discord server: https://discord.gg/PXnT6AcQWH

Follow me: @wounded_warriorauthor on Instagram
popular.author: Unknown

popular.synopsis:
When Allison was only sixteen, she had a baby girl that she never got to see nor hold. Her parents gave the baby up for adoption the minute she was born.
As soon as Allison turned legal, she left home in an attempt to find her child. Now ten years later, she has a solid lead for the first time, and she impulsively flies across the world in a desperate move to set her eyes on her daughter.
What she doesn't know is that she'll be running into Kane, her highschool sweetheart who got her pregnant. Kane has no idea that his daughter is out there, so a pleasant surprise awaits him.
Is second time really the charm for Kane and Allison?
popular.title: Never Yours
popular.author: Unknown

popular.synopsis:
Mercedes Kerunu is orphaned by mysterious and absurd circumstances and so begins her research into those events, trying to discover why her family died in a small refinery town on Mercury.

She follows the trail of two genius inventors across the solar system trying to unwind the exotic happenstances occurring all around.

The only other site this is on is RoyalRoad. Anywhere else is not there with my permission.

What to expect:

An intelligent protagonist who makes quick choices, not always to best choices though. She'll be a bit too prideful at the start, but don't worry, everyone gets their due in this story.

A host of intelligent antagonists and villains, because the idiot ball is heavy and we don't have time to workout. I don't like it when a villain is antagonistic just to act as an obstacle to the story.

Not just one ludicrously overpowered character who acts as the hand behind the curtain. Destiny is a tapestry where others weave with you.

Secrets abound. There a metric ton of secrets hidden throughout the story. Not references to funny things, those don't count as secrets. Real hidden details that sprinkle in unnecessary but still awesome world building, and sometimes foreshadow events to come. Encore.

Multiple arcs, each one exploring a planet and how it has been changed by the geniuses. This will be the basic story structure, wherein the arrival / subsequent departure of the planets mark that arc's ending.

No dumb boring power scaling, when a character becomes more powerful it isn't just to beat this one new hurdle and then power up again for the next one. We've got consequences and shenanigans galore.

A sci-fi world succumbing to magic and might. Not in the way you think, there will be no elves in this story, nor any mention of mana and other classical fantasy. We're dealing with the real shit, like wiggling your fingers and some pie appears.

Banana bread. (No really, it's important.)

Secret Identities for a myriad of characters. Dramatic irony fuels my core.

Gods, but not many other mythos tropes. This is called Nascent Divinity after all, the myths are just being made.

Tragic arcs and ending, but with catharsis. I tried to put my fears into certain characters throughout the story, and I think it worked out pretty well.

No info dump chapters because I like to keep the plot flowing. Some moments might provide a bit of exposition but never a long slog of world building thrust into your hands, that's boring.

A horribly inconsistent upload schedule as my focus is abysmal. Inspiration comes in waves but leaves a drought, you know how it is.

Modest 2k word chapter length on average but some might go for much longer. I'll try to keep the objective of chapter length "fitted to the plot" so I won't squish or stretch important moments to get a decent length.

Never stubbing as I don't know if I'll even finish, and if I do it'll be nice to have a free work under my name.
popular.title: Nascent Divinity
popular.author: FrozenPalms
